game.name: The famous diver
game.shortDescription: Your goal is to protect our main character from underwater bombs and predators while he swim to a certain point.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your goal is to protect our main character from underwater bombs and predators while he swim to a certain point.

reviewHighlights.text: Nice fly simulator with many different types of enemies (4) & many stuff (endless stars). 2 hours achievement could be 1 hour achievement :P
[b][quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote][/b] "The famous diver" is an asset flip, or what Valve call...
